title: Lynda - Persuasive UX: Creating Credibility by Chris Nodder
description:
Lynda - Persuasive UX: Creating Credibility by Chris Nodder
20m 43s Intermediate May 07, 2014 : Uploaded in Aug 21, 2014 By 2boweb



Credibility is currency with online audiences. By knowing how concepts like social proof ("if other people do it, so can I") and authority affect your audience or customers, you can build your credibility and influence their behavior. Dive into this course to learn more, and start putting these concepts to work for you.

Want more persuasive design techniques? Check out the rest of the courses in Chris Nodder's Persuasive UX series in 2boweb uploaded list earier courses.
